SELECT NOVEL_NUMBER , n.USER_NUMBER, u.USER_NICKNAME, NOVEL_TITLE , NOVEL_HASHTAG , NOVEL_UPLOADDATE , NOVEL_UPDATEDATE , NOVEL_CATEGORY , NOVEL_STATUS , NOVEL_SERIALSTATUS , NOVEL_INTRO , NOVEL_FILENAME , NOVEL_UPLOADPATH, NOVEL_UUID , NOVEL_ROUNDABOUTTOTAL, NOVEL_LIKECOUNTTOTAL , NOVEL_VIEWCOUNTTOTAL FROM ( SELECT NOVEL_NUMBER , USER_NUMBER, NOVEL_TITLE , NOVEL_HASHTAG , NOVEL_UPLOADDATE , NOVEL_UPDATEDATE , NOVEL_CATEGORY , NOVEL_STATUS , NOVEL_SERIALSTATUS , NOVEL_INTRO , NOVEL_FILENAME , NOVEL_UPLOADPATH, NOVEL_UUID , NOVEL_ROUNDABOUTTOTAL, NOVEL_LIKECOUNTTOTAL , NOVEL_VIEWCOUNTTOTAL FROM TBL_NOVEL
NOVEL_STATUS <= 3 NOVEL_SERIALSTATUS = 0 NOVEL_STATUS = 2
NOVEL_MONDAY = 1 NOVEL_TUESDAY = 1 NOVEL_WEDNESDAY = 1 NOVEL_THURSDAY = 1 NOVEL_FRIDAY = 1 NOVEL_SATURDAY = 1 NOVEL_SUNDAY = 1
AND NOVEL_HASHTAG LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
) n JOIN TBL_USER u ON u.USER_NUMBER = n.USER_NUMBER ORDER BY
NOVEL_VIEWCOUNTTOTAL NOVEL_LIKECOUNTTOTAL
DESC LIMIT 50 ;
